  1. Home
  2. City Departments

The City of Ovilla is committed to providing citizens, businesses, and developers with the information and support they need to expeditiously and safely design and build quality residential and commercial structures and subdivisions throughout the city.

The City is dedicated to the promotion and development of new and expanding businesses in Ovilla.
